title: Bug 13189 - Refactoring deleting fields context menu is overridden by message dialog
description: When setting up JUnit on both Linux Motif and Windows 2000, the following bug occurs.
OB: No context menu is displayed when right-clicking on 'fName' in the outliner. Instead, a message dialog asking whether to delete the getter/setter is shown immediately.
EB: The expected behavior is to display a context menu when right-clicking on 'fName' in the outliner, providing options related to deleting fields.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:

1. Enable the option 'Code Generator > Remove prefix from field names'.
2. Open the file TestCase.java.
3. In the outliner, right-click on 'fName'.
